bibl.title: Ptolemy "the Son" Reconsidered: Are there too Many Ptolemies?
bibl.note: Paper presented at the 21st Conference of the Australian Society for Classical Studies, University of Queensland, 6-10 July, 1998. - Offers an alternative view to: Werner HUSS, Ptolemaios der Sohn, ZPE 121 (1998) pp. 229-250, 2 tabl. The most likely identification of Ptolemy "the Son" is as the eldest son of Philadelphus and Arsinoë I.
bibl.seg: TUNNY Jennifer Ann, Ptolemy "the Son" Reconsidered: Are there too Many Ptolemies?
